name: Late Night Talks
description:
A short, late-night conversation with an exorcist. Who's also your boss. 

This game is created for O2A2! One sprite, one background, one illustration and under one thousand words. The time limit is one week but I end up doing most of it in one day, haha.

Features
- 1 ending although you can find different dialouges through the options.
- Some point & click! 
- A lot of talk about ghosts but nothing scary actually happens. 
- I finally learned renpy. Yippee. 

This game is technically episode 1.5 and a sequel to my previous game Silver Thread but you can play without it. 

Art & Writing & Renpy Programming speedrun: @_puchi

Renpy template : Elliot Gardepe
Pixel icons: VectorPixelStar
Music: Because of Yesterday - ChillMindscapes
